alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:49PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Davidson, western Rutherford and northeastern Williamson Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antioch, or 9 miles northeast of Franklin, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Nolensville, Oak Hill, Walterhill, Antioch, Rockvale and Triune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 near mile marker 215. Interstate 65 between mile markers 69 and 78. Interstate 24 between mile markers 53 and 79. Interstate 840 between mile markers 40 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
